scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:cjs:pkg
scripts.build:cjs:pkg: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); fs.mkdirSync('dist/cjs', { recursive: true }); fs.writeFileSync('dist/cjs/package.json', '{\"type\":\"commonjs\"}'); if (fs.existsSync('dist/types')) { const dtsFiles = fs.readdirSync('dist/types').filter(f => f.endsWith('.d.ts')); dtsFiles.forEach(file => { fs.copyFileSync(path.join('dist/types', file), path.join('dist/cjs', file)); }); }"
